API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.view.CullingState

type
class
version
3.1
Used to identify the culling state of an object.

A 3D object can be completely or partly inside the frustum of the camera, or completely outside of it.

Static Variables

INSIDE(inline,null) : Int

INTERSECT(inline,null) : Int

OUTSIDE(inline,null) : Int
